place_name: Night Swim Coffee | Old Pineville Road

reviews_data.review_text:
Amazing coffee. Probably my favorite roaster in CLT. I enjoy how they provide all coffee info (origin, varietal, grower, tasting notes, process) on the bag.
The baristas are also very good at what they do. I appreciate the effort put in at Night swim.

Warning: the beans are not cheap. $18-24+ for a 12oz bag, depending on what you're picking.
Crazy good, smooth, aromatic coffee. The homemade syrups just add to the incredible intensity of their coffee!

I love the inside of the cafe is very cozy and welcoming. I love that the designs the couches are very comfortable. And it looks very roomy when you walk in.

I got there Ambrosia Black Tea with almond milk and honey. It's not that sweet. Too me, I like my tea a bit sweet But it's good. The bagel with cream cheese with chives it's really good I love it! I like how it's set up as you can see on the picture.

I Will definitely come back over here before going to work. Y'all guys to book up the great work!
Love Night Swim! So many featured coffees that were unique, and the atmosphere was chill. Had the anaerobic Bolivia as espresso...amazing  Would be here everyday if I could.

I'm astonished with the level of quality and service Night Swim provides. I live in N. Charlotte, so I've rarely had the opportunity to visit, but now that I finally have, the coffees here are exceptional, not to mention the selection from emerging markets. I've seldom seen such care and attention to detail toward coffee as Night Swim has provided. Furthermore, Raven is as skilled as she is hospitable. Highly, highly recommend.
My favorite coffee spot in Charlotte!! Everything on their menu from the beans to their espresso drinks are so intentionally crafted and thoughtful.

I have been continually disappointed with the customer service/experience, or lack there of, at this location.

This is the second time in a row where I have waited 15+ minutes for my drink order while the particular individual fulfilling the orders apathetically plods along chatting with her cashier co worker, only to get orders wrong or "forget" to bring me my order after she asked that I wait outside with my dog (which I happily agreed to), in the lovely June hot and humid air. A singular drink should not take this long to fulfill unless you are working on sourcing the coffee beans to make the drink.

I love Night Swim coffee and want to continue to support them. However, if the customer service/experience at this location is not reviewed for opportunities to improve and deliver a better experience I will happily take my business and support elsewhere.

Great coffee, okay pastries and baked goods
Excellent and creative selection of beans

I didn't even get to taste the 16oz coffee I paid a premium for, because the splash of whole milk in my coffee curdled it.  Are we in the EU?  Coffee takes cream, aka half and half.  I would pay a quarter for half and half in my coffee.  Is night swim a franchise?  Did you have to change the name from skinny dip because you live in the Bible Belt?  One thing I'm not questioning is the snarky entitlement attitude of your coffee server.  Act like you want your customers' patronage and not like people don't have choices.  And your bagels are garbage, just stop trying to pass those off, call them day old bread rounds?

Such a neat place!! Harmony (I think that's what her name was) was so sweet and we really enjoyed talking to her!!! Coffee is amazing, I love that you can just peek in and watch them at the roasters :)
Such delicious coffee, and really nice atmosphere. Loved working remotely here
Best cup of joe in Charlotte!

They don't take cash which I find to be awkward, dystopian, and inattentive.

I love that they have vendor events in their roasting room.

Single origin espresso was well roasted and well pulled. Good atmosphere.

One of the best coffee in Charlotte. Pretty cozy with WiFi.
The barista gave a very unwelcome look. Her tone while placing my order was similar too. Hence I took out instead of seating in.

I've been a frequent visitor at this Night Swim Coffee, mainly due to its convenient proximity to my home and its suitability as a work spot. The coffee is consistently good, and the environment is generally comfortable for both quick visits and longer work sessions. However, I've noticed an unsettling trend with some of the staff. Their attitude seems overly partisan, and at times, unwelcoming to those who might not share their views. One staff member even questioned why I chose to frequent their cafe, hinting that I should consider other places.

It's concerning that this behavior is overlooked by the owners, as it significantly detracts from the otherwise positive aspects of the cafe. I hope management will encourage a more inclusive atmosphere moving forward, so the cafe can truly be a welcoming space for everyone.
Great atmosphere
Best cortado I've had in Charlotte.
I got the cereal milk Matcha and it was unique and good.

Good place decor. I don't get the ceiling we've been here more than a half hour.
Kool vibe and my type of local....
I want to love, but they seem to burn lattes! I've tried a few times.

Ayyyeee!!! This place made my day!!! When you walk in you are greeted by the scents of Heaven!! It's amazing. Next the barista, not sure of her name was she was super sweet and gave me patience and explanation when ordering. The restrooms are gender neutral, safe, fully stocked and clean. Then the roaster/machines on the side I found super intriguing and Rory- thank you so much, what an awesome human! Explained coffee and the process in detail that I could understand- it was definitely an intro, but extremely interesting nevertheless and allowed me to take some photos and video. The food and drinks were delicious. My partner had a blueberry muffin and I had the cereal milk matcha latte- so so sooo good. I asked for whipped cream as I was comparing to Starbucks- silly old me- Night Swim puts Starbucks to shame!!! One sip and no whipped cream necessary like literally so good!! The blue berry muffin is vegan- matter of fact I think everything is vegan there and my friend didn't save me any- it was that good! lol.. i also had the everything bagel and seasonal chive cream cream. The bagel was a bit salty, but i like salt so that works for me. Someone else may say otherwise so heads up for that. The cream cheese was very fresh and spot on- rivals New York Bagel Shop cream cheese!! Kudos!! Thank you for making my day! So glad we decided to take the detour on the way to work!! Atmosphere is super chill. Will definitely be back!!!
Have been coming here for some time and the Vanilla Latte with oat milk is always on point. Pair this with the coffee cake and makes for a great pick me up. My go to coffee spot!

Excelente lugar,  para los que gustan del buen cafe
Varias opciones,  bien preparado

Night Swim is amazing, you can find the freshest most delicious coffee beans here. Coffee drinks are make perfectly and ambiance is zen, perfect for a relaxing conversation and coworking. I wish they had more food options, besides bake goods.

Spectacular coffee, great vibes, lots of seating.
I highly recommend going here!

I got my usual latte and boy, was it delicious! My son got an iced matcha latte Ava it was very good as well! If you're dining in, they have cute, unique cups for you to drink from.

There's lots of seating, mostly indoors, with a few out of doors.
It was a relaxed, yet vibrant atmosphere.

I loved the experience and will certainly return in the future!
Not only to they have great coffee, they also have food trucks, and popup markets. Friendly staff.
Relaxed and extremely clean atmosphere. Coffee was delicious.
Great coffee a good spot for a work meeting/laptop morning.  Good wifi.

I've been to this location quite a few times and while my experience is always great, today was extraordinary! It was so easy to start a conversation with Kate and I've never had an easier conversation with someone in the food service industry (coming from someone who also works in the food service industry)!

Such a kind person and obviously the coffee was the best (as it typically is). Night Swim is definitely one of the best roasters I have tried!
Delicious craft coffee! Although my first time, knowing the tie with Not Just Coffee, I knew I was in for the same level of awesome, locally roasted coffee and espresso.
Delicious coffee. Worth the drive! Roasted right on site. Espresso machine is DIALED and brewed coffee is top notch and tasty.
Great coffee
Coffee is superb. 4 stars because I wish there were more things to eat. Good wifi and great coffee, and a chill atmosphere.

Night swim is my favorite coffee shop in Charlotte. They have the best coffee I have found in clt. I love working from these shops.  It's super creative, comfortable and they are designed really well. They also have the best tea I've found. Spirit teas are the best! I also love the gluten free white chocolate cranberry oatmeal cookie.
One of the best coffee shops I've been to in America! Great tasting coffee and lovely atmosphere.

Another coffee spot in Charlotte, do we need more? Yes! You probably drive right past it, but slow down and notice the black building...follow the smell of roasting inside and order a seasonal drink. Recently I tried the lavender latte, which is locally sourced. My favorite part!

Great place to get work done
Only thing is by 11:30 they ran out of food :( but means the food is great just sucks I could not try it
Really clean
And staff are friendly

Beautiful coffee shop, I got an herbal tea that was amazing. Nick was very friendly while I was waiting for my order. Good parking, private area for small meetings, outdoor seating. Can't wait to try the coffee I bought.
Absolutely outstanding coffees. Love it even more because they offer pour overs!!!

Great, cozy shop with refreshing service, delicious coffee, killer bagels, and plenty of work space. Immaculately clean! So happy to stumble upon it today and will def be back! **Get the scallion cream cheese if you get a bagel

Running my morning errands and spotted this bookmark as I yawned. Time for a coffee break.

Cool vibe here with tables all about and a big "community" table in the center. A friendly barista took my order and while I got settled onto their wifi, my name was called. Yes, that's my cortado. Served in the proper short glass, half espresso and half steamed milk. Same great caffeine boost but with less milk. Delicious!

I stayed for a bit to write this review and will do a couple of others before continuing my Saturday morning errands. A good spot to get some laptop done, though with the background music and the sound of coffee being made, probably not ideal for Zoom meetings.
My fiances' coffee was not good. My americano was just -too much sugar; also it had a lot of grounds in it :(

May 2023 edit: Coffee is still great and baristas are consistent. However, within the last 6months prices have gone up twice and it's gotten quite expensive for a small black coffee and a small whole milk latte (Jan 2023 $8.75 and May 2023 $9.20).

Fantastic coffee. Feels great to have real decent and consistent hot late!
Good coffee. Friendly baristas. The space felt open, light, and airy.
Discovered while passing through Charlotte, great espresso and seasonal specialty coffee drinks. Nice variety of in-house roasted beans for sale as well!
Amazing coffee!! Caramel Latte has perfect sweetness and nice flavor of caramel. Also, a simple and beautiful ambiance for remote work. Adding this place to my favorite coffee place in Charlotte.

Excellent spro

Morning guy was a pro

Great coffee! DELICIOUS bagels
Spent my morning here doing a zoom meeting and I was very pleased with the whole experience. The environment is very welcoming from the staff that make the coffee to the cleanliness of the place. Definitely added this place to my list of coffee shops to visit when I need to get work done and get a good coffee.
Some of the best coffee you can buy. Great location close to the interstate for a pit stop and pick me up. Awesome staff and a delicious cortado.

Nice alternative to Starbucks. Friendly staff, nice choices, very clean and inviting. Bags of coffee to go seem a bit pricy but I will not take a star away from that due to I have not researched the reason. Bottom line, good coffee for what is now considered a reasonable price. I will return.

Great espresso, I always look forward to their unique and flavorful coffee offerings. They usually have an incredible single origin offering and I can't help my self, I get it each time. The vibe is really cool and clean. After months of coming back I felt compelled to leave 5 stars because this place is the best around. Additionally, the service is outstanding, professional, and always friendly.
Delicious coffee and great atmosphere. Their salted caramel hot chocolate is tasty, especially with an espresso shot.
I got a cappuccino and it met my expectations! Highly recommend this spot. Sort of walkable from the hotels nearby.
Trendy coffee shop with decent coffee

I went in when it was closed. I know how did I get in? Well I thought it was open, with the unlocked door, customers, and an employee behind the counter.

Seems like a nice building.
The latte was  (chefs kiss). The staff was super friendly and nice.
SO good. Their autumn latte is amazing
Great service. The seasonal banana bread latte was incredible.
Very average to sub par - pour over very bitter - 10:30 am no food except 1 bagel- would not recommend and don't usually bother to leave reviews - but this place was not good

Love this gem of a place! It's got a clean, calming atmosphere which would make a great place to work during the day. The staff is friendly and accommodating, ordered an Autumn Latte which was unique and delicious! Highly recommend checking out Night Swim!!
Great coffee!! The staff was great!!
lattes are delicious, a little pricey, but delicious
Nice coffee spot with plenty of seating and friendly staff.   They have several locations around Charlotte.
Amazing coffee house. Great staff, even better coffee. You can also see the roasting process in house. Very cool place! Kevin the barista was amazing
The maple cardamom latte was too sweet for my taste. Their tomato scone was really good and fresh.
Amazing coffee. Love their drip and americano.
Best cappuccino in the area.. incredibly good. Creamy, roasty, incredibly crafted.. highly recommend! Awesome space too..
Cool, simple spot off the beaten path. I only give 4 stars because coffee/espresso was a bit underdeveloped for my liking. Staff were rad and kind.
Love this place! Employees are super kind and sweet! We got Malabar Tea and it was amazing. Their coffee is delicious too. Highly recommend for anyone! Very scandi style space.
The Capuchino was delicious, nice place to stop by and do some work, it was quiet and the service was excellent.
Great coffee! Super clean place with friendly staff! Love that they roast their own beans! Can't wait to go back my next time in town!

I loved how off the beaten path this place was. Great amount of parking and space. Coffee was exactly on point. The fancy pop tart was great as well. I wish they would have had my size in the shirt I wanted but if that's the only complaint then everything's fine
Do not pass up this small coffee shop! Friendly and chill atmosphere with great coffee.
Terrific coffee, service, smiles, conversation and friendly neighborhood vibe. Near south Blvd and close to 77.
Great new coffee shop with easy access from I-77 and close to the farmer's market. Excellent flat white, friendly service and homemade pastries.
Great coffee gorgeous interior!
Best latte ever!
They have a maple tahini oat milk latte that is so delicious! It is like drinking an oatmeal cookie, not overtly sweet and frothed to perfection. Easily one of the best coffee shops in Charlotte
Reminds me of the coworking-friendly coffee spaces in San Diego.
When I first heard about this place, I thought it was Knight Swim instead of Night Swim. Five stars
A beautiful space for a modern roastery, serving incredible third wave espresso drinks, pastries, and community. Can't beat it!

Nightswim was great! We stopped at the roastery location and it was a neat experience! Both drinks that we had were incredible! Additionally, the vibe of the place was great! I wish we could've stayed longer! Many of the great shops in town use Nightswim's coffee and I can see why! Will definitely be returning to Nightswim!
Fantastic coffee. Very knowledgeable and some great bakery items.
This is such a fresh addition to this end of town. Cozy workplace with delicious coffee and wonderful vibes. Come by to meet with friends or nestle into a corner to get away from the home office.
